This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason where concept is-a PurposeOfUse

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    PurposeOfUsepurpose of useReason for performing one or more operations on information, which may be permitted by source system's security policy in accordance with one or more privacy policies and consent directives.

    *Usage Notes:* The rationale or purpose for an act relating to the management of personal health information, such as collecting personal health information for research or public health purposes.
